titles.title: I've Found A New Worship, A New Worship

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found a new worship, a new worship,
A new worship in the Lord.
I've found a new worship, a new worship,
A new worship in the Lord.
Patience is the name of the battle,
Faith is the name of the walk,
Love is the name of the nature,
Truth is the name of the talk.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I've found a new patience ... faith ... love ... truth ...
